solution.sample: If we look up, for example, the word "house", we can see that it is related to "palace" and "houses" (in its meaning of building), but also to "representatives", "commons" or "parliament", since it can also be used to designate the legislative body of a government.

taskDescription: Go to https://projector.tensorflow.org/ and look for a polysemous word (right-hand pane), then explain the relationship it has with neighbouring words.
